document.full_text: at least 49 people were killed in demonstrations across syria on friday, a prominent activist said, the highest death toll in a single day since protests against the rule of president bashar al-assad erupted last month.
document.title: at least 49 killed in syrian protests: activist
lines_and_colors: at least 49 people were killed in demonstrations across syria on friday, a prominent activist said, the highest death toll in a single day since protests against the rule of president bashar al-assad erupted last month.
